duties_responsibilities.duty: Safely perform a wide range of tasks, including stacking corrugated product, conducting quality checks, material set-ups, and maintaining a clean and organized work area.
Operate various manufacturing equipment, follow specific directions, operate hand tools, and perform other duties as assigned.
Maintain a clean and safe work environment, comply with all safety regulations, read a tape measure, and have basic math and computer skills.
Assist team members in cleaning, starting up, and operating machines, as well as receiving raw material.
